name: Prosopanche cocuccii
distribution: Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America)
remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.521.3.3 The specific epithet honours Alfredo Elio Cocucci (1926-2015), a prolific professor, taxonomist and plant embryologist from Argentina, for his taxonomic, morphological and embryological contributions to Prosopanche and many other angiosperm groups.
